name: MartyOnlyNeedsOranges
description:
The game has a new food mechanism that make the game more dynamic, some will give points , others will slow you down , shrink you, etc. Futhermore, the color of the fruits that you eat will influence the color of the snake making it a second objective of the game. Also, you can change between two game modes (With Borders and Borderless) from the Options menu.

You can speed up the game by keeping the Space key pressed, pause it with P and exit with Escape
